question_text: Which scenario most likely requires an active signal converter rather than a simple adapter?
answer_options: Connecting a USB-C phone to a USB-A charger
Converting VGA output to HDMI input on a modern display
Plugging a USB mouse into a hub
correct_answer: Converting VGA output to HDMI input on a modern display
explanation: VGA is analog and HDMI is digital, so this conversion requires an active signal converter to process the analog-to-digital transition.
